mainText:
I am writing from Portugal, from an old iPad 1, one of the many fantastic devices Steve Jobs left us with.

Steve, thank you for your legacy! You will always be remembered and you are part of the history now.
No one deserves to suffer from that kind of diseases so I want to leave my condolencies to his family and friends. May our God be with you all the time.

Rest in peace.
author: RG
